title: Deadlift & Cindy - Full Power Session
notes: 60-min session: Heavy barbell strength followed by bodyweight benchmark 'Cindy'.

items: Dynamic hips and shoulder opener prep

blocks.name: Heavy Deadlift Progression
blocks.instructions: Work up to 255 lbs. End set should be within 5% of form failure.

blocks.name: Cindy - Benchmark
blocks.instructions: 20-min AMRAP - 5 Pull-ups, 10 Push-ups, 15 Air Squats. Log total rounds completed.
